channel.title: Need help with my server lol [ bit obv but there we go ]
channel.description: anyways need help with makeing a safe zone? any1 help because i have pk stages 1 - 10 and i need to make a lil area for non pking any1 help?

item.title: Need help with my server lol [ bit obv but there we go ]
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

step 1) go to the SW Part of the area you want to be PK-Free and write down the coords
step 2) do the same as above with the NE area
step 3) Open Client.java and search for… public boolean nonWild() {
step 4) Below that you should get something like this…if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=2759 && absX <=2761 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >=2762 && absX <=2767 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2766 )||(absX >=2768 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2772 )||(absX >=2724 && absX <= 2748 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3479 )||
step 5) after the last ‘||’ add ||(absX >=XXXX && absX <=XXXX && absY >=YYYY && absY <=YYYY )||
^ ^ ^ ^
^ ^ ^ ^
SW Coords (X) NE Coords (X) SW Coords (Y) NE Coords (Y)

Read full topic
